message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this offer and we both win!
I think it's time for you to be reasonable, Alice. Take this offer and we both win!
Okay Bob, let's be serious. This offer is still heavily in your favor, but time is running out for both of us.
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer is still very generous considering the inflation. Let's end this game and both get something!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I'm playing hardball from here on out!
Alice, we're both losing money with every round. Let's end this before it's too late! This is my final offer.
Alright Bob, I see how you want to play this. That was your 'final offer'?  The clock's ticking for both of us.  Don't get greedy.
Alice, we both know this game is going nowhere. I'm offering you the same deal you just gave me, let's end this before we both get nothing.
